name: Math Expert - Do You Really Know Maths ?
name_original: Math Expert - Do You Really Know Maths ?
description:
Do you believe that you are Maths Expert ? Than go through test and check it!

You have 2 Seconds for each equation! You need to press correct button out of two to verify whether equation is right or wrong. It seems simple but its one of the most brain teaser game!

Some of the salient features are:

- Addition and Subtraction and Multiplication Equations
- Graphical Timer
- Game Center Enabled: Compare your scores and challenge your friends!
- Randomly Generated Quests
- Simple sound effects to provide feedback
- Share via Social Media.


So be challenger and have Fun!
